document.heading: Housing Production Trust Fund Baseline Funding Amendment Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-208, the “Housing Production Trust Fund Baseline Funding Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-708. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Oct. 28, 2014, and Nov. 18, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Dec. 8, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-511 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-208 became effective on Mar. 11, 2015.
